title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

altTitles.ja: シティーハンター

description.en:
Ryo Saeba is a "sweeper" in the city of Tokyo. He works as a troubleshooter - cleaning the streets of vermin and helping out desperate people. Sometimes he's a bodyguard, other times he's an assassin but whatever Ryo does, he does it well. In fact, his only flaw is his hormones - he loves the ladies maybe a little too much and sometimes turns into an idiot when he's near them! Thankfully, he's got people like his partner, Kaori Makimura to keep him in check.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Akasha (2020; complete edition)

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Lu Meihe, the art team leader who is called "Cobra" by her subordinates, is a person with a strict appearance and a pure heart. She has a crush on Lin Wenjing, an intern in the group, but due to her image and personality, she cannot express her friendship naturally, so she can only pin her emotions on the sketchbook she carries with her. In an accident, the secret of the sketchbook was discovered by the person concerned. Only then did Lu Meihe know that Lin Wenjing, who seemed gentle and easy-going, seemed to be not a quiet queen... I was bullied by the junior again today, so happy, what should I do?
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

altTitles.zh-hk: 想盡情享受的常客小姐

altTitles.zh: 想尽情享受的常客小姐

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

altTitles.ja: ロンリー・ローリー・ラブ

description.en:
"Oopsie! I'm late, I'm late!" High school girl, Yumeno Saki, collides at a corner with...

This is a high-speed four-wheel romantic comedy based on the experiences of a distant relative. Lonely Lorry Love is a oneshot that won the Sunday Webry Rookie Award. A brand new work by new artist, Kutou Ten.

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.ja: 怜-Toki-

description.en: A Saki spin-off series. It follows the characters Toki Onjouji, Ryuuka Shimizudani and other girls from Osaka during their elementary and middle school years.

altTitles.ja: 咲
咲 -Saki-
咲‐Saki‐

description.en:
Saki's never been a big fan of mahjong. A lifetime of being forced to play with family at holidays (and losing her money as a consequence...) has left a foul taste for the game in her mouth. When she's convinced, though, to play a game with her classmates, she discovers that not only has fending off her family left her with an uncanny ability for the game but, more surprisingly, that it can even be fun!

Is this revelation enough to cleanse Saki's distaste for the game? Can her classmates convince her to join their club, or is there just too much baggage to make it worth her while?

altTitles.ja: ベノム 求愛性少女症候群

altTitles.es: Venom: Síndrome de las Chicas que Buscan Amor

description.en:
Loneliness is like poison, I have nothing, I'm a failure, I'm a failure, and so on... In a social networking site where girls vent their pain, she comes across a rumor of "Courtship Girl Syndrome," which only teenage girls are affected by. She thought it was just a myth, a disease with a cute name and symptoms like those of a manga character. However, the abnormalities that began to occur in the girl's body as a result of a certain problem are very similar to the rumors...?

We are affected by the blue spring disease.
description.es: Venom, Darling Dance, Failure Girl y otras famosas canciones de la popular vocaloid P, Kairiki Bear, han sido convertidas en "Historias". ¡La soledad es como el veneno, no tengo nada, soy un fracaso, soy una fracasada, etc.! En una red social donde la chica desahoga su dolor, se topa con el rumor del "Síndrome de las chicas que buscan amor", que solo afecta a las adolescentes. Pensó que era solo un mito, una enfermedad con un nombre bonito y síntomas como los de un personaje de manga. Sin embargo, las anomalías que empezaron a producirse en el cuerpo de la chica como consecuencia de cierto problema son ¿muy parecidas a los rumores...? Estamos afectadas por la enfermedad de la primavera azul.
description.id:
Venom, Dari Dance, Failure Girl, dan lagu-lagu terkenal lainnya oleh vokaloid populer P, Kairiki Bear, telah diubah menjadi "Cerita"!

Kesepian sama seperti racun, aku tidak punya apa-apa, aku gagal, aku gagal, dan seterusnya... Di situs jejaring sosial tempat para gadis melampiaskan rasa sakit mereka, dia menemukan rumor "Sindrom Gadis Berpacaran," yang hanya berpengaruh pada gadis remaja.
Dia pikir itu hanya mitos, gejala penyakit dengan nama yang imut seperti karakter manga. Namun, kelainan yang terjadi di tubuh gadis itu sangat mirip dengan rumor...?
Kami terjangkit penyakit musim semi biru.
description.ja: 「孤独って毒みたい」「私には何も無い」「自分は失敗作だから」―― そんな苦しさを吐き出すためのSNSの裏アカで少女が目にしたのは、10代の女子だけが発症するという『求愛性少女症候群』の噂。カワイイ名前にマンガのキャラクターみたいな症状でできているそんな病、ただの作り話だと思っていた。 けれど、ある悩みをきっかけに少女の身体に起き始めた異常は、その噂とよく似ていて――？私たちは、青い春の病に侵されている。

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: オナニーマスター黒沢

description.en:
Onani means masturbation. And that's what this guy is good at. Every day after school, he sneaks into the mostly unused girls bathroom on the 3rd floor, and masturbates. Until one day, when he's caught by a bullied girl with a hidden agenda.  
This is a story of mistakes, redemption, and the choices made in between. It contains the worst and best of the human condition.
description.uk: На перший погляд 14-річний Куросава Какеру нічим особливим не виділяється. Вчиться він середнє, друзів не має, ворогів немає. Він живе непомітно і це йому подобається. Але у нього є один темний секрет - щодня після уроків він іде прямо до порожнього жіночого туалету і займається там онанізмом, уявляючи в голові своїх однокласниць. Але одного дня на виході з туалету він зустрічається з маленькою тихою дівчиною. На той момент він ще не знає, що ця кількасекундна зустріч змінить його життя назавжди.
description.pt-br:
"Onani" significa masturbação. E é nisso que esse garoto é bom. Todo dia, depois da aula, ele se esconde no banheiro feminino menos usado, no terceiro andar do prédio 1 da escola, e lá se masturba. Até o dia em que ele é descoberto… Esta é uma história de erros e redenção e as escolhas feitas entre eles e contém o melhor e o pior das condições humanas, descobertas pelos personagens no desenvolver da história.   
  
**Links:**  
- [Epilogue Novel (After chapter 31 but before 31.5)](https://www.novelupdates.com/series/onani-master-kurosawa-after-the-juvenile/)

title.en: Gyaru Maid to Akuyaku Reijou ~Ojou-sama no Happy End shika Katan!~

altTitles.ja: ギャルメイドと悪役令嬢 ～おじょーさまのハッピーエンドしか勝たん！～

altTitles.en: Gal Maid & Villainess: Only Milady's Happy End Will Win!

altTitles.pl: Modna Służka i Antagonistka: Liczy Się Tylko Pomyślność Mojej Pani!

description.en: A gyaru named Serina is reincarnated into the world of an otome game as a background character who is sold off by her family and now works as the exclusive maid of the game's villainess Almelia. Yuri romcom hijinks ensue.
description.ja: ギャルのセリナが転生したのは、オタクな友達に激推しされてハマった乙女ゲームの世界だった！モブキャラに転生していたセリナは親の借金のカタで売られ、悪役令嬢・アルメリアのもとでメイドをすることになるが…。
description.pl: Gyaru o imieniu Serina zostaje reinkarnowana w świecie gry otome jako postać drugoplanowa, która zostaje sprzedana przez swoją rodzinę i teraz pracuje jako ekskluzywna pokojówka złoczyńcy Almelii. Yuri romcom
description.pt-br: Uma gyaru chamada Serina é reencarnada no mundo de um Otome game (jogo de "namoro"), como uma personagem secundária que é vendida por sua família e agora trabalha como a empregada exclusiva da vilã do jogo, Almelia. Confusões românticas Yuri de forma hilariantes se desdobram.

title.en: Hommono No Kano Jo Ni Shitaku Naru Made, Watashi De Tameshite I Yo.

altTitles.ja: 本物のカノジョにしたくなるまで、私で試していいよ。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hommono No Kano Jo Ni Shitaku Naru Made, Watashi De Tameshite I Yo.

altTitles.en: Try Me Until You Choose Me as Your Real Girlfriend

description.en:
In the reality dating show "Our Season," stunning high school students come together for what seems like the ultimate dream—a perfect youth filled with romance and adventure. But behind the glamorous facade lies a more complicated reality: a false school life where they barter their youth for a chance at stardom in the entertainment world.

Aoishi thought he’d follow the script for a picture-perfect experience. But when he meets Karen, eager to fulfill her first love, and Emma, his scripted girlfriend, everything shifts. Add to that his secret relationship with Asuka, and Aoishi finds himself tangled in a web of desire and deception.

As they go through their lives on camera, the lines between real feelings and fake romances start to blur, pulling them into a storm of complicated relationships and strong emotions. Can Aoishi find a way to untangle the mess before it takes over their lives? The most dangerous part of their youth is just about to begin!

Adapted from a popular light novel, now in manga form!

altTitles.ja: シガンバナ

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.
description.pt-br:
Neste país aparentemente pacífico, vive um assassino que caça outros de sua espécie - um assassino de assassinos. Antes de eliminar seus alvos, ele sempre questiona seus motivos para matar - esta é sua maneira de abraçar seu destino.

Do autor de "Until Your Bones Rot" e "The Shadows of Who We Once Were", Utsumi Yae apresenta um drama emocionante sobre as vidas daqueles que vivem no limite entre a vida e a morte.

altTitles.ja: かくしごと

description.en:
An only slightly particular ability hidden from others, a power of no benefit to anyone, yet recently because of it I can't help but be interested in you.  
  
Highlighting the secrets of 5 people and their slow-going feelings towards another…   
  
A series by the author of I Want To Eat Your Pancreas, Sumino Yoru, and the artist of Kanojo wa Rokurokubi, Nieki Zui. Sumino has previously released a Novel with the same name which this series is based on. The artist is working on this series, published in Gekkan Komikku @ Banchi, as well as Jun and Kaoru, published in Bessatsu Shounen Magazine, simultaneously.
description.es:
Una habilidad poco particular escondida a los demás, un poder que no beneficia a nadie, pero recientemente como consecuencia de ello no puedo evitar interesarme por ti.  
Destacando los secretos de 5 personas y sus sentimientos paulatinamente hacia otro…  
  
Una serie del autor de "Quiero comerme tu páncreas", Sumino Yoru, y el artista de Kanojo wa Rokurokubi, Nieki Zui. Sumino ha lanzado previamente una novela con el mismo nombre en la que se basa esta serie. El artista está trabajando en esta serie, publicada en Gekkan Komikku @ Banchi, así como en Jun y Kaoru, publicada en la revista Bessatsu Shounen, simultáneamente.
description.pt-br: Uma sutil habilidade particular escondida dos outros, um poder sem benefício para qualquer um, e mesmo assim, eu não consigo evitar de estar interessado em você. Contando os segredos de 5 pessoas e seus lentos sentimentos um pelo outro...

title.en: Company and Private Life: On and Off

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活－オンとオフ－

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off

altTitles.es-la: Vida empresarial y privada: ON y OFF

altTitles.en: Company and Private Life: On and Off

description.en:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). 

Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. 

When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
description.ja:
働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！
働く人々には会社（オン）と私生活（オフ）がある。ある人は会社員と女装ロリィタ。ある人は会社員と男装パンク。オンとオフのギャップにキュン必至！ 働く二人の大変身（メタモルフォーゼ）日常譚！X（旧:Twitter）にて累計200万いいね突破の話題作が、イラストから完全コマ割りでコミックス化！
description.es-la: Estos trabajadores tienen una vida en la empresa (ON) y otra privada (OFF). El es un oficinista que se viste de Lolita. Ella es una oficinistas que se viste de punk.

altTitles.ja: 絢爛たるグランドセーヌ

description.en: When Kanade was very young, she went to a ballet performance of her neighbour, Risa, and was overwhelmed by her amazing dancing. She decided then and there that she wanted to dance like Risa, and her parents agreed to let her take ballet lessons. Ballet is much harder than Risa's beautiful dancing may have led her to believe, but Kanade is determined to endure and become a wonderful ballerina!
description.pt-br: Kanade é uma garota com uma incrível habilidade de observar e executar as coisas. Essa é uma história sobre sua jornada descobrindo as belezas do balé clássico e a alegria em dançá-lo. A popular autora de mangás para maiores de dezoito anos, Cuvie, nos trás um mangás que faz a paixão do balé clássico ganhar vida.

altTitles.ja: アイドリッシュセブン Re:member

description.en: The novel, "Re:member," from the popular idol rhythm game makes it to comic format! The past of Idolish7's senpai group, Re:vale, is finally revealed! What hurdles have Banri, Yuki and Momo overcome before the formation of the group…?

description.de: Die Highschool-Schülerin Aoi ist schwer verliebt in Makoto, ein superhübsches Mädchen, die die gleiche Schule besucht. Aber als Aoi ihren Mut zusammennimmt, Makoto ihre Liebe zu gestehen, nimmt die Geschichte plötzlich eine unerwartete Wendung: In Wirklichkeit ist Makato ein Junge, der sich als Mädchen verkleidet!
description.en:
The story of a crossdresser who receives a confession from a junior.

---

**Official Translations:**

description.fr: Aoi, une élève de seconde, a eu le coup de coeur pour Makoto, une fille de 1ère super jolie. Mais quand Aoi prend son courage à deux mains pour se déclarer, Makoto lui fait une révélation inattendue... En réalité, c'est un garçon qui se déguise en fille !
description.ja: 男の娘が後輩に告白される話です。
description.ko:
하나오카 마코토는 귀여운 것을 아주 좋아하는 남자 아이.
어느 날, 마코토는 자신을 여자라고 착각하고 있는 여자 후배 사키에게 고백을 받는다.
거기에서 마코토는 자신이 남자인 것을 밝히지만 사키는 포기하지 않는다.
그 후에 마코토에 대해 특별한 감정을 품고 있는 류지와 3명 사이에서의 아련한 감정이 생겨난다.
description.ru: Десятиклассница Саки признаётся в любви одиннадцатикласснице, но та не спешит отвечать взаимностью. Всё дело в том, что Ханаока переодетый парень, и он уверен, что его общество принесёт Саки лишь проблемы. Однако Саки нисколько не разочаровывается, узнав правду, а наоборот полна решимости стать его первой любовью.
description.th: ฮานาโอกะ มาโคโตะ เป็นนักเรียน ม.ปลาย ที่ไม่ว่าหนุ่มคนไหนเมื่อได้พบเห็นก็ไม่อาจละสายตาไปจากเธอได้ เพราะความน่ารักแสนสวยของเธอ แต่แท้จริงแล้วมาโคโตะนั้นเป็นผู้ชายที่แต่งตัวเป็นผู้หญิง! แถมแต่งได้สวยกว่าเด็กนักเรียนหญิงจริง ๆ เสียอีก เรื่องราวชุลมุนของความรักและความเข้าใจผิด ๆ ถูก ๆ ของวัยรุ่น ม.ปลาย จึงเริ่มต้นขึ้น!!
description.zh:
花季少女表白温柔女前辈，
谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？
作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！
description.zh-hk: 蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生　エスケープ編

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Escape Arc

description.en: Adaption of Light Novel 24-25.
description.ja: 七賢人を名乗るレイモンド・クラークにより、「トーラス・シルバー」の正体が司波達也であると暴露されてしまった。USNAが提唱するディオーネー計画への参加を巡って世界中が達也の動向に注目し、深雪たちが通う魔法科高校も好奇の目に晒される事態に。だが達也はかねてより進めていたプロジェクトを利用して、世界を裏から操ろうとする者たちに反旗を翻す――!!

The Sword Art Online Dengeki Comic Anthology is a comic anthology of Sword Art Online-themed short, independent manga stories by various illustrators, published under the Dengeki Comics imprint.

altTitles.ja: 私の少年

description.en:
Satoko Tawada is an office worker. She's almost 30 years old, but she still hasn't been able to find happiness in her life. Fate brings her with Mashuu Hayami, a beautiful 12-year-old boy whom she finds practicing soccer all by himself in the park. On a whim, she decides to help Mashuu with his practice, with her knowledge of soccer at her disposal. As they practice together on an everyday routine, the two eventually develop an emotional bond. When Satoko's ex-boyfriend deceives her, Mashuu gladly comforts her. And when Satoko learns of Mashuu's mostly absent parents, she starts to concern herself with his personal life. The two lonely souls find common ground and develop an emotional bond that transcends their age difference and circumstances. With this newfound bond, new feelings start to sprout within Satoko. Are these feelings that of maternity? Or is it something else?

**Awards:**
- Ranked #11 in the 2017 Manga Taisho Awards
- Won 3rd place in the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Awards, Category Print Manga (2017)
- Won 2nd Place in the 2017 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! Awards for male readers
- Won 1st Place in the 2016 Oreman (俺マン) My Best Manga Gran Prix manga rankings.
description.pt-br: Satoko Tawada é uma mulher de 30 anos que trabalha em uma companhia, mas ainda não conseguiu achar a felicidade em sua vida. O destino faz com que ela cruze caminhos com Mashuu Hayami, um belo garoto de 12 anos de idade que ela encontra treinando futebol. Em um impulso, ela decide o ajudar com seu treino. Enquanto praticam e criam uma rotina juntos, os dois criam laços emocionais um pelo outro, confortando e apoiando quando o outro precisa. Duas almas solitárias criam um vinculo que transcende a diferença de idades entre eles.

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

altTitles.ja: コローリ コローレ クレアーレ
ココクレ

description.en: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main

altTitles.ja: Dr.コトー診療所

altTitles.vi: Phòng khám của bác sĩ Koto

description.en:
Gotou Kensuke (a.k.a. Dr. Koto), a brilliant surgeon who had been working at a famous university hospital in Tokyo, took responsibility for a medical error and came to the remote island of Koshiki, which had been without a doctor for three months. The clinic there lacked medical facilities and was unable to provide full-scale treatment or surgery, and could only send patients to a hospital on the mainland, a six-hour boat ride away. Then a village boy came down with acute appendicitis!
Will Koto continue to transport them to the mainland? Or...

---
  
- Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for general manga in 2004.
- Published in Indonesian as *Dr. Koto* by Elex Media Komputindo (2010).
description.id: Pulau Koshiki, pulau terisolasi oleh laut yang jauh dari mana pun. Namun saat seorang dokter bedah jenius mendarat di pulau yang tak punya fasilitas memadai ini, sebuah kisah drama penuh keajaiban pun dimulai! Operasi aneurisma, pneumothorax, sampai persalinan? Kensuke Goto, pria ini seolah memiliki kemampuan yang hebat untuk menyembuhkan penyakit seberat apa pun. Kisah dokter di pulau terpencil yang mengharukan yang mempertanyakan makna hidup sesungguhnya.

altTitles.ja: 超人X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...
description.es-la: Azuma Higashi es un chico bastante popular. Aunque puede ser algo pequeño, tiene fuertes habilidades de lucha y sus calificaciones son las mejores de su clase. Esto es lo opuesto a Tokio Kurohara, su amigo que no escucha en clase y es simplemente un espectador mientras Azuma pelea. No obstante, el vínculo de estos dos amigos de la infancia es fuerte, sin importar cuán diferentes sean. Los dos viven en la prefectura de Yamato, un distrito increíblemente ordinario con algunas áreas destruidas por Choujin. Los choujin son humanos con poderes sobrenaturales y peligrosos, a menudo la causa de la destrucción circundante. Mientras regresaban a casa, Tokio y Azuma se encuentran con un Choujin, que amenaza con matarlos. Sin posibilidad de escapar, Tokio y Azuma toman una decisión crucial: convertirse en Choujin. Con estos nuevos poderes adquiridos, Tokio ya no puede ser el espectador que alguna vez fue, ahora atrapado en un mundo donde la lucha es inevitable.

altTitles.ja: 履いてください、鷹峰さん

description.en:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
description.ja: 生徒会長の鷹峰さんはスクールカーストのトップ中のトップ、神！　対して、友達も存在感も皆無の白田くんはある日、鷹峰さんの生おっぱいを見てしまう。そこから変わるスクールライフ。――「私にパンツを履かせなさい」なんと鷹峰さんは”未だ穢れ知らぬ乙女（エターナル・バージンロード）”という能力でパンツを脱いで時をかける少女だった。ノーパンではいられない鷹峰さんのクローゼットとして白田くんは鷹峰さんにモモ色おねだりをされ続けるハメに…。
description.ru:
Президент студсовета, Такамине-сан находится на самом верху школьной иерархии. Она — практически бог!  
Однажды Широта-кун случайно увидел обнажённую грудь Такамине. С того момента его школьная жизнь изменилась.  
- "Надень мои трусики для меня"   
В итоге Широта-кун оказался в стеснительном положении из-за розовых пристрастий Такамине-сан.  
  


---

  
**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuichi_hiiragi)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2056601)  
- [Official Page (JP)](https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/joker/series/takamine/)
description.pt-br:
A presidente do conselho estudantil, Takamine-san, está no topo da hierarquia escolar, uma deusa! Um dia, Shirota-kun acidentalmente vê os seios nus de Takamine-san. A partir de então, sua vida escolar mudou, sendo chantageado para uma vida de servidão a Takamine-san. ― “Coloque minha calcinha para mim”
Shirota-kun acabou em uma situação difícil devido aos favores cor-de-rosa de Takamine-san.

title.en: Boku no Kawaii Musume wa Futago no Kenja: Tokugi ga Debafu no Teihen Kuro Mashirube-shi, Sodateta Futago no Musume ga S-rank no Dai Kenja ni Natte Shimau

altTitles.ja: 僕のかわいい娘は双子の賢者 ～特技がデバフの底辺黒魔導士、育てた双子の娘がSランクの大賢者になってしまう～

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kawaii Musume wa Futago no Kenja

altTitles.en: My Lovely Daughters Are Both Sages: I’m a Black Mage Whose Special Skill Is Debuffing, and the Twin Daughters I Raised Become S-Ranked Great Sages!

altTitles.ja: 僕のかわいい娘は双子の賢者

description.en:
Elcan, a dark magician, is fired from his party due to his lack of talent with offensive magic.  As he wandered the streets he came across twins, who were abandoned by their parents. 

"I couldn't be a good dark magician, but I want to make their lives better!" 

He decided to retire from being an adventurer and raise these two girls as his own. And so, he raised his daughters, Corona and Selena. Teaching them black magic and enrolling them in a prestigious magician’s academy. 

After learning more about magic, the girls return to see their father with some important news… They are S-rank Sages?! And they want to form a party with him?! 

A new adventure between a father and his daughters begin!

altTitles.ja: 波よ聞いてくれ

description.en:
On a night out drinking to get over being duped and ditched by her last boyfriend,  Minare Koda ends up 
providing a massive drunken rant for Matou, the director of a radio station. 
The next day, she is shocked to hear her own voice being broadcast on the radio! She rushes to the studio,
leaving her job at a curry soup and bread restaurant in jeopardy. However, her drunken rant and the next day's 
impromptu damage-control live broadcast end up earning her an invitation to try working at the radio station!

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.ja: 生徒会にも穴はある!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

altTitles.vi: Hội học sinh cũng lắm trò vui!

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

description.en: Su, born in prison, has always wanted to see the "crow" from what her mother told her. On the day when she was about to be secretly executed, Gill, the artificial intelligence, was thrown into prison for a test run. She compasses everything from the outside world in her database. Su developed special feelings for Gill, although she didn't care that the words Gill spoke were programmed or from her own consciousness. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell, the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could bring her solace.

altTitles.ja: 篠崎くんのメンテ事情

description.en:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!
description.uk:
Шінодзакі – звичайнісінький офісний планктон, в якого, однак, останнім часом аж надто легко відвалюється голова. Та ще й раптом у його звичайне, за виключенням того прикрого непорозуміння, життя вривається молода жінка на ім'я Юуяке.

Вона стверджує, що її бабуся-чарівниця в минулому докорінно видозмінила тіло Шінодзакі – і тепер він набитий безліччю механізмів!

...Які, власне, потребують технічного обслуговування, яке Юуяке тепер, вочевидь, буде проводити на регулярній основі.

Якось так і починаються дещо безбарвні будні звичайнісінького офісного планктону, чаклунки та чудернацької чорної істоти на ім'я Ґрей!

description.en:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

altTitles.ja: ヤニねこ

description.en: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.

altTitles.ja: タプリスシュガーステップ

description.en:
A heartwarming everyday comedy about the trio of first-year students: Tapris, an earnest and pure angel who doesn't seem to be Gabriel's junior, Shinohara-san, a human who loves cute things, and Mei, a demon whose thinking is hard to understand.  
Whether it's the excitement of a first time experience, the excitement of a new friend, or playing with the Gabriel whom she looks up to, Tapris is busy every day!​  


---
description.ru:
Трогательная повседневная комедия о трех первогодках старшей школы: Таприс, искреннем и чистом ангеле, который, кажется, не младше Габриэль, Синохаре-сан, человеке, который любит милые вещи, и Мэй, демоне, чье мышление трудно понять.  
Будь то волнение от первого опыта, волнение от нового друга или игра с Габриэль, на которую она смотрит снизу вверх, Таприс занята каждый день!​

altTitles.ja: To LOVEる -とらぶる- ダークネス

description.en:
Rito Yuuki continues to be caught in over-the-top perverted scenarios, now uncensored. The alien Deviluke sisters - Lala, Momo, and Nana - still use their unique abilities in an attempt to grab Rito's love confession. Momo, in particular, has a vision: a harem of women all in love with Rito, with Momo herself in the center. After all, if everyone has an equal share of Rito, everyone wins - at least, she thinks.  
  
As she enacts this plan, the former alien mercenary Yami, aka Golden Darkness, struggles between her former life as a killer and her current life on Earth. Things get complicated when Mea, a girl with powers similar to Yami's, becomes interested in Rito. Just who is this new enemy?

Ever wondered what would happen if the characters from the series Konosuba were put in a Modern setting?

Well here you have the answer!!!

---

**Note:** All rights of Konosuba belong to their original author Natsume Akatsuki and its illustrator Mishima Kurone.

---

**Links:**
- [Official Twitter of the artist](https://twitter.com/bhive003)
- [Official Twitter of the fan series](https://twitter.com/Gen_Suba_)

title.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Gamer

altTitles.en: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Player

description.en: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

altTitles.ja: 夢なし先生の進路指導

description.en: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him "Yumenashi-sensei" ("Dreamless-sensei"/"Dream Crusher–sensei").
description.ja: 元キャリアコンサルタントの高校教師・高梨（たかなし）は、生徒から「夢なし先生」と呼ばれている。彼は進路指導時、生徒の「夢」に対し現実的なデータや世の中の実情を突きつけ、否定し、覚悟を問う。それでも夢を追い、のちに夢破れ、どん底の中でも諦めきれない生徒がいれば、卒業後でも手を差し伸べ、「諦めるための授業」を行うのだった。

title.en: “Life de Ukete Life de Naguru” Korezo Watashi no Hisshouhou

altTitles.ja: 『ライフで受けてライフで殴る』これぞ私の必勝法@COMIC

altTitles.zh: 『用命来扛，用命反击』这就是我的必胜法则@COMIC

description.ja:
「ライフがあれば、余裕だね！」
VRMMOが一大ゲームジャンルとして確立されている、現代より少し未来の日本。
VRゲーム初心者のユキは親友のカナに誘われ、配信しながらプレイをすることに。
彼女が閃いた遊び方——それはHP極振り×カウンタースキル“GAMAN”の究極脳筋プレイ！？
当然、他ステータスは全て０な上、攻撃するにもまずはノーガードで殴られる必要があるのだ。
周囲からは驚かれ笑われるも、そんなものはどこ吹く風！
どんな敵モンスターも、貯めたダメージそのまま極太ビームでお返し＆殲滅！
ノリと勢いでレア職業“聖女”や大量の称号を次々とゲットしていく。
遂には、ゲーム開始早々うっかり大規模イベントを発生させてしまい……？
駆け引き無視して一撃逆転！
砲台系少女のVRMMOファンタジー、開幕!!
description.zh:
「只要还有生命值，就没什么大不了的！」
距离现代稍微更近未来一些的日本，VRMMO成为一大游戏分类。
VR游戏新手小雪在好友小奏的邀请下，开始了一边玩游戏一边直播的冒险。
她灵光一闪想出的游玩思路是——将HP加到极限×使用反击技能“GAMAN（忍耐）”的究极莽夫流玩法！？
当然，不仅除了HP以外其他属性都是0，而且要攻击的话，也必须先卸防挨打才能反击。
无论周围的人们如何惊讶或嘲笑，她都将之全抛却脑后！
无论遇上什么怪物，她都能将受到的伤害蓄积起来并以超强射线进行反击&歼灭！
凭借一时兴起的种种行动，她接连获得了稀有职业“圣女”和大量称号。
最终，在游戏开服后不久，她就无意中引发了大规模事件……？
无视策略，一击逆转！
炮台系少女的VRMMO奇幻故事，就此开幕！

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

altTitles.vi: Hijiri-kun Chỉ Muốn Sống Thanh Liêm

description.en: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

title.en: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore

altTitles.ja: 地下アイドルを影で支える俺

altTitles.en: Supporting an Underground Idol from the Shadows

description.en:
Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa , saying, “Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school.” 

He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
description.pl: Kageyama, niewyróżniający się chłopak, otrzymuje potajemnie wiadomość od koleżanki z klasy, Natsukawy, o treści "Spotkajmy się po szkole w miejscu z Karaoke". Idzie tam z nią sam na sam. Tam, Kageyama pokazuje coś o co został poproszony przez Natsukawe.
description.pt-br:
Kageyama, um garoto normal, recebe secretamente uma mensagem da colega de classe Natsukawa, dizendo: “Encontre-me no karaokê de sempre depois da escola”.

Ele vai ao karaokê sozinho com ela. Lá, Kageyama revela algo que Natsukawa pediu para mostrar a ela.

description.en: "Let's go out with me." While Ki Young Hyun, a timid model student, was leaving school early, the person he bumped into in an alley was Daehan, who was famous for being a bully at school. He was scared and tried to sneak away from him, but he suddenly grabbed his wrist and dragged him into the cafe....

title.en: The Son of the First Emperor Kills Enemies and Becomes a God

altTitles.zh: 大秦：始皇之子杀敌升级成神

altTitles.zh-ro: Daqin: Shi Huang Zhizi Sha Di Shengji Cheng Shen
Dàqín: Shǐ Huáng Zhīzǐ Shā Dí Shēngjí Chéng Shén

altTitles.en: Daqin: The First Emperor's Son Killed Enemies to Upgrade to Be God
Da Qin The Son Of The First Emperor Kills Enemies And Becomes A God

description.en: Zhao Qi gets reborn to the warring period. At the time when the Qin emperor, Ying Zheng, started sweeping the 6 nations, and rule the world. Enlisting in the army Without hesitation, I didn’t expect once I start killing enemies I would level up the system! Slowly but surely, Zhao Qi became the commander for Da Qin’s army, when he saw emperor Qin he was immediately startled, he is actually the son of the emperor, Da Qin’s prince!
description.zh: 赵祁重生到了战国时期。正值于秦始皇嬴政开启扫六合，统天下之时。毅然入伍从军，没想到竟然开启杀敌升级系统！赵祁一步步成为了大秦锐士的统帅，当看到秦始皇后，顿时惊了，自己竟然是始皇之子，大秦长公子！
